name: ALL HAIL GODDROON
description:
You are Goddroon. Your world has been infested with foreign creatures. Carrying a golden gun with unlimited ammo, you should see what you can do about that.

Every single element inside this game was created entirely from scratch by Goddroon. This is the first version of the game. Please be understanding and patient if it seems glitchy or in other ways flawed to you.
